title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after setting the output location, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations. Setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974: Setting classpath / output location should be offered as one operation. Similar to the validation process that checks the classpath and output location at once, the setting of classpath / output location should be made as a single operation. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
